titleInfo.title: Rocky Mountain Welding Co. Basketball Team

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#658 Dr. John Finesilver as a teenager, sports.'' On photograph: ''John Finesilver 3rd from left, front, capt. of Rocky Mtn Welding Co, Basketball team, #658.''

mods.abstract: The Rocky Mountain Welding Company basketball team with their coaches. John Finesilver seated third from the left in the front row holding a basketball.
